walkout.translation[0].definitions[0].de: an occasion when people stop working or leave a meeting as a protest
walkout.translation[0].definitions[0].ex: Members of the Irish delegation staged a walk-out.
walkout.translation[1].definitions[0].de: an occasion when workers stop working and leave their office or factory as a protest
walkout.translation[1].definitions[0].ex: The talks broke off on Tuesday, prompting anationwide walkout of about 200,000 rail workers.
